awd_titl_txt: CISE Research Instrumentation: An Interdisciplinary Center  for Scientific Visualization
awd_abstract_narration: This award is to purchase a workstation, video                             production hardware and software to support research in areas                   of analysis and presentation of experimental fluid and                          granular flow, visualization and mathematical analysis of                       pattern formations and spatiotemporal chaos in large domains,                   visualization of solid modeling, and photorealistic animation                   of chemical reactions on surfaces.                                                                                                                              The effectiveness of large-scale numerical simulation                           problems in computer science and the natural sciences are                       dependent on high-speed computation and increasingly                            sophisticated visualization techniques.  Duke University will                   be establishing a high-quality facility for the support of                      scientific visualization with emphasis on computer animation,                   for use by faculty in computer science and the natural                          sciences.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
